meanings.definition: A person or thing that inseminates.
meanings.sent1: The inseminators helped the farmers by fertilizing the crops.
meanings.sent2: The inseminators at the farm were responsible for breeding the animals.
meanings.sent3: The inseminators were so busy, they accidentally fertilized the wrong field!
meanings.sent4: The inseminators of ideas, they spread creativity wherever they went.
meanings.sent5: The inseminators carefully carried out their task of pollinating the flowers.
